synopsis.text: After a grueling conflict among students at St. Francesca Academy, peace prevails, and the anticipation for summer vacation grows. The girls, eager to leave their battles behind, cast their votes and unanimously decide to spend their break on a sun-soaked, tropical island in the south. Coincidentally, the newly elected student council president, Enshou, invites them to a private resort she owns for spring break. As the heroines don their alluring swimwear, they embark on a journey filled with playful escapades and laughter, promising a memorable vacation for everyone.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
